entries.name: Lost & Found
entries.body: This diary holds memories of terrible things. Things that were covered up. Things that happened at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

entries.name: Ginny Weasley
entries.body: I've found a new friend to play with her name is Ginny Weasley

entries.name: Pity
entries.body: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.

entries.name: Love is Powerful
entries.body: Love as powerful as your mother’s for you leaves it’s own mark. To have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever.

entries.name: Never be Ashamed
entries.body: I am what I am, an’ I’m not ashamed. ‘Never be ashamed,’ my ol’ dad used ter say, ‘there’s some who’ll hold it against you, but they’re not worth botherin’ with.

entries.name: Unknown Fear
entries.body: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.

entries.name: Do the Dead Leave Us?
entries.body: You think the dead we loved ever truly leave us? You think that we don’t recall them more clearly than ever in times of great trouble?

entries.name: Who we really are
entries.body: We’ve all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That’s who we really are.

entries.name: What a Man is Truely Like
entries.body: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
